name: Delta CRJ700 Full Flight Experience - Louisville (SDF) to Detroit (DTW)
description:
Thanks for watching this Full Flight Experience!  For our ninth anniversary, my wife Beth and I decided to use some Delta miles and head over to Europe for a three-country tour. Our trip in November 2018 is one we'll never forgot; we still talk about it and reminisce fondly of the beautiful places we visited, fun people we met, and the time we spent together.

The fun started at our home airport in Louisville, and it never let up. This seven-flight, one-train journey started at SDF on a quiet fall day. This first leg is one I've flown many times before, but the thrill of the trip spurs me on!  Detroit is a frequent jumping-off point for international trips to Europe and Asia, so it's a great place to get this trip going.

While I've done a photo tour on my blog Miles By Foot, I took the opportunity to show you Louisville's humble two concourses, a day in the life of a bustling, regional airport. You'll follow us from boarding to pushback, take-off to landing, and taxiing up before deplaning for our next great adventure.

Thanks for flying in, and stay tuned for the upcoming legs of this journey to and from the British Isles!

--------------------------------

Flight Information
Airline: Delta Airlines (GoJet Airlines)
Flight Number: DAL6177
Date of Flight: Tuesday, November 6th, 2018

Origin Airport: Louisville International Airport (KSDF/SDF)
Destination Airport: Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport (KDTW/DTW)

Departing Gate: A5
Boarding Time: 14:03 EST
Scheduled Departure: 14:22 EST
Actual Departure from Gate: 14:24 EST
Takeoff Runway and Time: RWY 29 / 14:34 EST

Landing Runway and Time: RWY 22R / 15:24 EST
Scheduled Arrival: 15:47 EST
Actual Arrival at Gate: 15:48 EST
Arriving Gate: A61

--------------------------------

Aircraft Information
Type: Bombardier CRJ-700
Registration: N3##CA 
Aircraft Delivery: Fall 2012
Engines: 2x GE CF34-8C
Seat: 10C & 10D

--------------------------------

Gear
Nikon D3200/18-55mm
Canon Vixia HFM30
Edited in Adobe Premiere Pro/IrfanView

Aircraft and flight information from Planespotters.net and flightaware.com
